Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: MAG275QF
Cabinet Color: Metallic Black


Display
Screen Size: 27"
Widescreen: Yes
Glare Screen: Non-glare
Panel: Rapid IPS
Display Type: QHD
Resolution: 2560 x 1440 (2K)
Viewing Angle: 178° (H) / 178° (V)
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 300 cd/m2
Contrast Ratio: 1,000:1
Response Time: 0.5ms (GTG)
Display Colors: 16.7 Million
Monitor Pixel Density: 0.3114mm
Refresh Rate: 180 Hz
Curved Surface Screen: Flat Panel


Connectivity
Video Ports: 1 x DisplayPort 1.4 / 2 x HDMI 2.0b


Power
Power Consumption: Power On: 36W
Power Saving/Off: <0.5W


Convenience
Stand Adjustments: Tilt -5° ~ 20°
VESA Compatibility - Mountable: 100 x 100mm
Features: Flat screen for eSports experience
Rapid IPS Panel for better color contrast & accuracy
Super narrow bezel for max viewing size
0.5ms GtG Super-Fast Response


Dimensions & Weight
Dimensions (H x W x D): 17.90" x 24.15" x 8.66" with Stand
14.20" x 24.15" x 2.28" without Stand
Weight: 8.71 lbs. with stand


Packaging

Label: Monitor MSI MAG 27" 1440p 180Hz IPS 0.5ms
